questions.title: Feeling Sad or Low
questions.subTitle: How often have you felt sad or low in the past two weeks?
questions.name: feelingSadOrLow
questions.info: Feeling down, hopeless, empty and tearful

questions.title: Feeling Inadequate or Useless
questions.subTitle: How often have you felt inadequate or worthless in the past two weeks?
questions.name: feelingInadequateOrUseless
questions.info: Feeling like a failure, feeling guilty, feeling ashamed

questions.title: Excessive Worry
questions.subTitle: How often have you felt inadequate or worthless in the past two weeks?
questions.name: excessiveWorry
questions.info: Feeling like a failure, feeling guilty, feeling ashamed

questions.title: Low Self Esteem
questions.subTitle: How often have you felt that you have low self-esteem in the past two weeks?
questions.name: lowSelfEsteem
questions.info: Feeling worthless, feeling like you are not good enough, and being overly self-critical

questions.title: Aggressive Behavior
questions.subTitle: Do you find yourself being more aggressive or agitated than usual?
questions.name: aggressiveBehavior
questions.info: Picking fights with peers or authority figures, being easily angered or irritated, throwing tantrums or objects

questions.title: Suspensions/Punishments
questions.subTitle: Have you had any suspensions or punishments for behavioral issues at school or home?
questions.name: suspensions
questions.info: Fighting with others, damaging property, skipping school, substance use

questions.title: Suicidal Thoughts
questions.subTitle: Have you had any thoughts of harming yourself or ending your life in the past 2 weeks?
questions.name: suicidalThoughts
questions.info: Feeling hopeless or like there's no way out, Talking about wanting to die or hurt oneself, Making plans or preparations for suicide Experiencing unbearable emotional or psychological pain, Feeling like a burden to others

questions.title: Social Withdrawal
questions.subTitle: Have you recently withdrawn from social situations or activities that you used to participate in?
questions.name: socialWithdrawal
questions.info: Not feeling like going out with friends or participating in extracurricular activities, Losing interest in hobbies or things that were once enjoyable, Feeling unmotivated to do anything and wanting to stay in bed all day

questions.title: Motivation loss
questions.subTitle: Do you feel like you have a lack of motivation or energy to engage in activities?
questions.name: motivationLoss
questions.info: Not feeling like going out with friends or participating in extracurricular activities, Losing interest in hobbies or things that were once enjoyable, Feeling unmotivated to do anything and wanting to stay in bed all day

questions.title: Concentration Issues
questions.subTitle: Do you have difficulties concentrating during classes or while studying?
questions.name: concentrationIssues
questions.info: Difficulty in keeping up with classwork, Inability to understand or comprehend the subject matter,Difficulty completing assignments or homework,                    Lack of motivation to attend classes or study,Poor grades or academic performance

questions.title: Decline in Grades
questions.subTitle: Have you experienced a decline in your academic performance compared to your previous performance?
questions.name: declineInGrades
questions.info: Difficulty in keeping up with classwork, Inability to understand or comprehend the subject matter,Difficulty completing assignments or homework,                    Lack of motivation to attend classes or study,Poor grades or academic performance

questions.title: Sleep Troubles
questions.subTitle: Do you have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep?
questions.name: sleepTroubles
questions.info: Nightmares (night terrors) Insomnia Sleepwalking

questions.title: Restful Sleep
questions.subTitle: Do you feel rested and refreshed when you wake up in the morning?
questions.name: restfulSleep

questions.name: newPhysicalSymptoms

questions.title: Traumatic events
questions.subTitle: Have you experienced or witnessed any traumatic events, such as physical or sexual abuse, accidents, natural disasters, or violence?
questions.name: traumaticEvents
questions.info: Watch our medical experts to help decide the routine

questions.title: Trauma-related thoughts
questions.subTitle: How often do you experience flashbacks, nightmares, or intrusive thoughts related to the traumatic event(s)?
questions.name: traumaThoughts
questions.info: car accidents, physical abuse, domestic violence, natural disasters, etc

questions.title: Academic stress
questions.subTitle: How often do you feel overwhelmed by academic workload and expectations?
questions.name: academicStress
questions.info: excessive homework, high expectations from parents or teachers, pressure to perform well academically, etc

questions.title: Family Conflict
questions.subTitle: How often do you experience conflict or tension with family members?
questions.name: familyConflict
questions.info: divorce or separation, substance abuse, physical or emotional abuse, neglect, etc

questions.title: Family Situation
questions.subTitle: Have you experienced a significant change in your family situation in the past year, such as divorce, separation, or the death of a family member?
questions.name: familySituation
questions.info: Divorce of parents, death of a family member, serious illness of a family member, family conflict or violence

questions.title: Living situation change
questions.name: situationChange
questions.info: Have you experienced a major change in your living situation in the past year, such as moving to a new home or school?

questions.title: Bullying and harassment
questions.subTitle: How often have you experienced bullying, harassment, or discrimination from peers in the past month?
questions.name: bullyingAndHarassment
questions.info: teasing, body shaming, cyberbullying, discrimination based on race, gender, sexuality, etc

questions.title: Coping with Heartbreak
questions.subTitle: Have you experienced any recent changes or difficulties in your relationships?
questions.name: copingWithHeartbreak
questions.info: breakups, conflicts, or betrayal?

questions.title: Feeling disconnected
questions.subTitle: How often do you feel lonely or isolated from others?
questions.name: feelingDisconnected
questions.info: romantic relationships, friendships, family relationships, etc

questions.title: Chronic illness
questions.subTitle: Have you been diagnosed with a chronic illness or health problem?
questions.name: chronicIllness
questions.info: breakups, conflicts, or betrayal?

questions.title: Family member's disorder
questions.subTitle: Do you have a family member who has been diagnosed with a mental health disorder?
questions.name: familyMemberDisorder
questions.info: depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, or any other mental health conditions

questions.title: Financial difficulties
questions.subTitle: Do you come from a low-income household?
questions.name: financialDifficulties
questions.info: Watch our medical experts to help decide the routine

questions.title: Opportunity limitations
questions.subTitle: Do you feel that your socioeconomic status limits your opportunities?
questions.name: opportunityLimitations
questions.info: poverty, lack of access to education or healthcare, or living in a disadvantaged community

questions.title: Substance Use
questions.subTitle: Have you used any illegal substances in the past year?
questions.name: substanceUse

followUp.title: Substance use Frequency
followUp.subTitle: How frequently do you use these substances?
followUp.name: substanceUseFrequency
followUp.info: being exposed to drugs or alcohol in your environment, or using drugs or alcohol as a coping mechanism for stress or emotional issues

questions.title: Exposure to substance abuse
questions.subTitle: Have you ever been exposed to substance abuse, such as seeing family members or friends using drugs or alcohol?
questions.name: substanceAbuseExposure
questions.info: Seeing family members or friends using drugs or alcohol at home, parties, or social events Using drugs or alcohol to cope with stress or negative emotionsTrying drugs or alcohol out of curiosity or peer pressure

options.name: Yes, but it doesn't bother me

questions.name: mentalHealthEducation
questions.info: Have you been educated on mental health? Do you know where to go for help if you need it?

questions.title: Enjoyable Activities
